DAZ: Good day, Ramie! How are you doing?
2
1
RAMIE: Goodness! You're too bright to look directly at, standing in the sun like that, Daz! Why are you so shiny? What do you have coated on your exterior?
3
1
DAZ: <i>And where's your suit?!</i How are you walking around on the surface of Ember Twin exposed like that? Did Cassava invent some unbelievably strong and lustrous sunscreen, composed of his love for you?
4 3
DAZ: <i>Hah!</i An amusing guess, Ramie, but does my complexion not appear familiar? I am currently composed of alloy projected from a projection pool!
5 4
RAMIE: Oh? I hadn't noticed!! Does that mean you've invented a new type of projection stone that allows us to wander freely outside the range of the pool, Daz? I am awestruck! Have you come up with a name for this new stone yet?
6 5
DAZ: I am flattered, my friend. And yes, Cassava came up with one: the <color=orange>voyager stone!</color> Named after the thalassic planet it was conceived on, it will take us on many incredible voyages across the star system!
6 7
RAMIE: That's a shame. I was about to propose it be named the sightless stone - I will soon lose mine if I continue staring at your alloy vessel! I eagerly look forward to being able to use your voyager stones one day, my dear friend.
